name: py-omegaconf

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
A hierarchical configuration system, with support for merging
configurations from multiple sources (YAML config files,
dataclasses/objects and CLI arguments) providing a consistent API
regardless of how the configuration was created.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pytest-runner
dependencies.description: Invoke py.test as distutils command with dependency resolution.

dependencies.name: py-antlr4-python3-runtime
dependencies.description:
This package provides runtime libraries required to use parsers
generated for the Python3 language by version 4 of ANTLR (ANother Tool
for Language Recognition).

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description:
The Java Development Kit (JDK) released by Oracle Corporation in the
form of a binary product aimed at Java developers. Includes a complete
JRE plus tools for developing, debugging, and monitoring Java
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo
dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data. TorchGeo is a PyTorch domain library, similar to
torchvision, providing datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained
models specific to geospatial data.

dependent_to.name: py-hydra-core
dependent_to.description: A framework for elegantly configuring complex applications.
